prompts.prompt: create a page counter so that when a user visits my website it increases by one. The counter should read "Nuts BUSTED" with an integer representing the numbered page visit following the text Nuts BUSTED
add a backend API and update it whenever a new visitor visits the page. Fetch the count when the app loads initially. Keep the counter in a global variable in the backend for now.

In addition to storing the count in a global variable, also update it in a backend Postgres database. Use supabase database and keep the keys in a env file. Add appropriate error handling in case the env vars are not configured in which case it should keep using the global variable value.
